description.content: Panneau de jeu correspondant à un essai

details.content:
# Détails
## Members
- int roll_left (0-2)
- int score (0-...)
- int pin_left (0-10)
- int bonus_score (0-2) Quand on fait un strike : bonus_score = 2, spare : bonus_score = 1
## Methods
- void roll (int)
- bool can_roll
- bool can_add_bonus_score : bonus_score > 0
- int get_score
- void add_bonus_score (int) : score += arg, bonus_score--

description.content: Class used to represent a game of bowling

details.content:
# Details
## Members
- Array(10) of Pannels
- current_pannel (0..9)
## Methods
- void total_score
- void roll(int)
